mapper.select: SELECT fa_num, fa_type, fa_title, fa_content, fa_date FROM faq ORDER BY fa_num desc, fa_date desc
mapper.insert: insert into faq( fa_num, fa_type, fa_title, fa_content, fa_date) values (faq_seq.nextval, #{fa_type}, #{fa_title}, #{fa_content}, #{fa_date})
mapper.update: UPDATE faq SET type = ${type}, title = ${title}, content = ${content}, WHERE fa_num = #{fa_num}
